roleset.name: annoy
roleset.note: RANKLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rankle' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.1, Framenet entry Experiencer obj. (from rankle.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive, nasty trace chain
example.text: He was a ``socialist warrior'' who [*T*-1]-2 felt [*-2]-3 rankled [*-3] by West Germany's enormous postwar prosperity and the Bonn government's steadfast refusal to recognize the legitimacy of his state.
example.arg: by West Germany's enormous postwar prosperity and the Bonn government's steadfast refusal to recognize the legitimacy of his state
